A quick guide to adding additional region support
1. Copy one of the exsting files to use as a template
2. Reference the folowing location for the various regional plans https://github.com/RAKWireless/rak_common_for_gateway/blob/761136e126/lora/rak2247_usb/global_conf/ 
3. Modify the file that you have as a template
4. Add a new line to the mod.rs file


	pub mod lora_gateway_hat_eu868;
	pub mod lora_gateway_hat_us915;
	pub mod lora_gateway_hat_au915;
	pub mod lora_gateway_hat_xxxx;

5. Update the file ../../mod.rs

search for this section
       "pi_supply_lora_gateway_hat_eu868" => {
            vendor::pi_supply::lora_gateway_hat_eu868::new(&config)
        }
        "pi_supply_lora_gateway_hat_us915" => {
            vendor::pi_supply::lora_gateway_hat_us915::new(&config)
        }
        "pi_supply_lora_gateway_hat_au915" => {
            vendor::pi_supply::lora_gateway_hat_au915::new(&config)
        }

add a new section to match the new region
        "pi_supply_lora_gateway_hat_xxxx" => {
            vendor::pi_supply::lora_gateway_hat_xxxx::new(&config)
        }

6. head to the root of the chirpstack-concentratord git 
7. run
	make build
8. Built file can be found in targets/release/
9. Test chripstack-concentratord-sx1301 
	./chirpstack-concentratord-sx1301 -c /etc/chirpstack-concentratord-sx1301/chirpstack-concentratord-sx1301.toml

the above assumes you have used chripstack-concnetratod-sx1301 configfile > /etc/chirpstack-concentratord-sx1301/chirpstack-concentratord-sx1301.toml and modified to you needs

your new model will be

	lora_gateway_hat_xxxx

Cheers
